Summarize the key details of the following product description and present in valid JSON format. Focus on extracting the features and characteristics in data form, without flavor text or prose.

---

Title: Christmas Coffee Spoons Set of 8, Gold Dessert Spoons with Gift Box, Espresso Spoons Ice Cream Spoon for Christmas Party Decor Tableware

Description: [Christmas Spoon Set]: The package includes 8 pieces of gold Christmas spoons with Christmas pattern pendants, plenty of them in various styles, the special Christmas elements are perfect for use in holiday parties and can be used as small Christmas table decorations.

[Delicate Christmas Elements Design]: these stainless steel coffee spoons are designed with 4 different shapes of charms, including Santa Claus, Christmas tree, boots, and walking stick, these decorations make the spoons look more lovely and add festive atmosphere.

[Durable Material]: our coffee spoons are made of high quality food grade stainless steel, non-toxic and tasteless, lightweight and durable, safe to use, not easy to fade, easy to clean, the surface is hand polished, lasting like new, never rust, can be used for a long time.

[Wide Range of Applications]: perfect for Christmas, family, party, cafe, family gathering, breakfast feast, dinner, celebration, wedding or daily use, you can use them as tea spoons, coffee spoons, dessert spoons, soup spoons, stirring spoons and mixing spoons.

[Perfect Christmas Gift]: High quality and practical gold coffee spoons with classic red Christmas gift box, you can use it directly as a Christmas gift for your friends, no need to purchase additional gift boxes.

Christmas Coffee Spoons Set of 8
